scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build --prefix strapi" "npm run build --prefix web"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "docker compose -f nextcloud/docker-compose.yml up -d" "npm run develop --prefix strapi" "npm run dev --prefix web" "npm run start --prefix mobile"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "docker compose -f nextcloud/docker-compose.yml up -d" "npm run start --prefix strapi" "npm run start --prefix web"
